item.description:
Revolve Nation is proud to present the first in a monthly CEO Breakfast Discussion Series! We are proud to welcome this month's speaker, Marc Zwetchkenbaum, founder of Marc Z Legal Staffing (http://www.marczlegal.... Marc will speak to us about the trials he faced in growing his New England staffing company and how he overcame those challenges over the past 25 years. He will also focus on the hiring process and "getting the right people on the bus" as you start to bring your team together.

Schedule:
-7:30am-8:00am: Networking/Continental Breakfast
-8:00am-8:40am: Special Guest lecture on his journey and employment matters, plus a Q&A roundtable discussion about the topic
-8:40am-9:00am: Networking

Revolve Nation is the largest community of entrepreneurs and business owners in the city of Boston, offering networking, discussion groups, seminars, business plan hot-seats, and more! Join us here, where professionals and entrepreneurs meet in mutual support of business to network, socialize, learn, and promote a thriving community of entrepreneurs. Coffee and Bagels/Doughnuts will be served!

Like anything in life, what you put into a networking group is what you get out of it. Revolve Nation is designed for entrepreneurs and professionals who are serious about building their business, investing in relationships, and helping each other to succeed. You will get the most out of this group with regular attendance.

The way the group seeks to achieve these outcomes:
1) Regular attendance (when possible)
2) Create a fun and supportive environment!

SPONSORS:
Revolve, Inc: www.revolvethis.com
Exemplar Law Partners: www.exemplarlaw.com

See you all next time!
item.name: Sunrise Meeting: Revolve Nation CEO Breakfast!!!
